Public Instance methods

admin?()

Alias for is_admin?

fullname(options = {})

Returns the firstname and lastname as a string If both are blank, returns the login options 

  :flipped=false  : returns "lastname, firstname"

[Source]

    # File app/models/user.rb, line 39
39:   def fullname(options = {})
40:     unless(self.lastname.blank? && self.firstname.blank?)
41:       options = (default_options = { :flipped => false }.merge(options))
42:       options[:flipped] ? "#{self.lastname}, #{self.firstname}".squeeze(" ") : "#{self.firstname} #{self.lastname}".squeeze(" ")
43:     else
44:       self.login
45:     end
46:   end
